description: Pyth Network feed IDs for common assets on Base mainnet. Feed IDs can be found at https://pyth.network/developers/price-feed-ids

WETH/USD.description: Wrapped Ethereum / US Dollar (same as ETH/USD)

wstETH/USD.description: Lido Wrapped Staked ETH / US Dollar

weETH/ETH.description: Wrapped eETH / ETH (Feed ID not confirmed - verify at https://pyth.network/developers/price-feed-ids)
weETH/ETH.warning: This is a placeholder. Do not use in production without verifying the correct feed ID.

caveats: Feed IDs are current as of 2024. Always verify against the official Pyth registry at https://pyth.network/developers/price-feed-ids
Some specialized feeds (e.g., weETH/ETH) may not be available. Use proxy calculations or Chainlink fallback.
Pyth prices are updated based on on-chain demand. Not all feeds update at the same frequency.
For ratio feeds (e.g., cbETH/ETH), compose with base asset feed (ETH/USD) to get USD pricing.

usage.environment_variable: Set PYTH_FEED_MAP_PATH to the path of this file (or your custom version)
usage.override: You can create a custom version of this file with different feeds or IDs
